import { Nav, Tab } from 'react-bootstrap' import React, { useState } from 'react' import Conversations from './Conversations'; import Contacts from './Contacts'; const CONVERSATIONS_KEY = "conversation"; const CONTACTS_KEY = "contacts"; function Sidebar({ id }) { const [activeKey, setActiveKey] = useState(CONVERSATIONS_KEY); const conversationsOpen = activeKey === CONVERSATIONS_KEY; return (
Conversations Contacts
Your Id: {id}
) } export default Sidebar
